column5: I was wondering if anyone knew where I could find a cheap canoe?  preferably a square one and light too...lol  I've wanted one for awhile and it doesnt look like my brother is going to go halves like he said he would now.
i have one with a motor too how much you lookng to spend
not a whole lot.  just want to be able to go fishing in small lakes and not have to fish from shore.
you want a canoe that's cheap and light?  what is this magical canoe and where do i get one?

I have a sqaure back fibre glass canoe and its been with me for 11 years now - I have both a trolling motor and 2 hp for it.  Back then it was in the $500 range and i'm sure their much more expensive now.  I suggest you continue to save your money and get a quality canoe - after all you'll be spending hours upon hours in it....and believe me, it will be worth the wait.  -Sawyer
650 for canoe  here are some pics for ya   comes with the motor on the left     let me know if your interested. i also have a 7.5 hp (no gas tank)
